answers.answer: I'm excited also. I'm dialted 1cm. But its going on 2weeks I can't wait to have my little boy.:). Goodluck to you and your son. I'm due aprl16 but ultrasounds been showing april 8th. so I'm gettn induced april 9th

Lucky you! You have a date! I have another growth scan next monday, so maybe they might make some decisions for me then. I also have gestational diabetes, so not sure if they think that complicates things even more, but if i was to be induced in my 38th week that would be great, although i'd really like to try and go into labor naturally this time. All the best for the birth of your little boy on the 9th. Don't forget to update us!

question: I'm due April11, and my 'baby arrived' button has popped up!! So excited, i guess my little boy could come any day now, i cannot wait. I suppose all you ladies are probably experiencing the same thing!
title: The end is near!!
